pages.title: Another W
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Heisei Generations Forever (2018, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zi_o/devices/another_w_driver)Another W Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch$(li)Strength IV (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost
